content:
Hello folks,

I'm looking to integrate the SMART on FHIR EHR launch with AWS Cognito.

I have read a couple of blog posts and wondered if anyone here could point me in the direction of any useful information.

Or if anyone has directly been through the pain with Cognito and could recommend a better solution other than sticking with AWS.

Thank you in advance.

Have you seen this chart before?
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/SMART+on+FHIR+server+implementations

Has some helpful details as to which auth solutions support SMART Launch specifically
@Alex J Rolfe I will take a look thanks
